text: tyara pachi tamara hrdaya pat'thara maphaka parantu tenathi pana vadhare sakhata tha'i gaya, ketalaka pat'tharo manthi to nahero vahi nikale che ane ketalaka to phati jaya che ane te manthi pani nikale che ane ketalaka allahana bhayathi padi jaya che ane tame allaha ta'alane potana karyothi ajana na samajo
